Ver 1.3 Minigun重置,管道触发修改等..Translation: Ver 1.3 Minigun reset, pipe trigger modifications, etc. EN Translation: Allenw @ Ozlin server

无线电: 干得漂亮,士兵们,看来你们顺利上列车了..Translation: Radio: Well done, soldiers. It seems you have successfully boarded the train.

无线电: 现在我将调整你们的行动代号为Filth..Translation: Radio: I will now change your codename to Filth.

呼叫指挥部,这里是代号Filth,火车已经到隧道半程了..Translation: Calling Command, this is Filth. The train has reached halfway through the tunnel.

那头机械巨兽几乎抹去了我们一半的战士,我们需要增援..Translation: That mechanical beast has wiped out almost half of our soldiers; we need reinforcements.

无线电: 明白了,我会派遣一支精锐部队前往你们的坐标附近..Translation: Radio: Understood, I will send an elite unit to your coordinates.

无线电: 代号Filth,关于NPST行动的协议....Translation: Radio: Codename Filth, regarding the NPST operation agreement...

他妈的,终究还是发生了吗...Translation: Damn it, has it finally happened..

无线电: 代号Filth,发生什么了,赶紧回复..Translation: Radio: Codename Filth, what happened? Respond quickly.

后车厢的队友被病毒异化了,他们在攻击列车!.Translation: The teammates in the rear carriage have been mutated by the virus; they are attacking the train!

长官,你收到了吗....长官,指挥部!.Translation: Commander, do you copy.... Commander, Command!

去你妈的,信号被切断了!.Translation: Damn it, the signal has been cut off!

所有人抓稳!我们必须让列车脱轨了!.Translation: Everyone hold on! We have to derail the train!

我靠..我们还活着..看来还没到该死去的时候..Translation: Wow.. we are still alive.. Looks like it's not time to die yet.

隧道前面已经被严重污染了..Translation: The tunnel ahead has been severely contaminated.

我们得想办法绕出去,也许还能找到新的列车..Translation: We need to find a way to go around; maybe we can find a new train.

但愿我们能挺过去..Translation: Hopefully we can get through this.

出发吧,士兵们,武运隆昌..Translation: Let's go, soldiers, may fortune be with us.

这板车挡路了,得赶紧推开..Translation: This cart is blocking the way; we need to push it aside quickly.

呼...这玩意还挺重的...Translation: Phew... this thing is pretty heavy...

不行,得加快脚步了...Translation: No, we need to pick up the pace...

???: 我们正在离开收容区..Translation: ???: We are leaving the containment area.

???: 收容计划已失效,重复,收容计划已失效..Translation: ???: The containment protocol has failed, repeat, the containment protocol has failed.

???: ..化合物已经彻底破坏,结束通话..Translation: ???: The compound has been completely destroyed, ending the call.

原来是他们干的..可恶..他们到底是什么人..Translation: So it was them... Damn it... who are they?

有一批武装人员从直升机下来了!.Translation: A group of armed personnel has descended from the helicopter!

应该就是总部口中的精锐部队了..Translation: They should be the elite unit mentioned by headquarters.

..你们刚从一座大楼逃出来了?那一定是场恶战吧..Translation: ..Did you just escape from a building? That must have been a fierce battle.

你们应该也有行动代号..代号Vertigo?我没猜错吧..Translation: You should also have a codename... Codename Vertigo? Am I right?

看来不爱说话啊,罢了,任务重要..Translation: Looks like you're not much of a talker, but never mind, the mission is more important.

小心点,那桶化合物泄露了,从管道绕过去..Translation: Be careful, that barrel of compound is leaking; go around through the pipes.

无线电: 不敢相信你们都还活着..Translation: Radio: I can't believe you are all still alive.

我们跟增援汇合了,我们要怎么离开这里,长官..Translation: We have joined up with the reinforcements. How do we get out of here, Commander?

无线电: 我们在尝试重新定位你们的坐标,坚持下去!.Translation: Radio: We are trying to relocate your coordinates, hang in there!

无线电: 去更开阔的地方联系我们,祝你们好运..Translation: Radio: Go to a more open area to contact us, good luck.

大门即将解锁..Translation: The main gate is about to unlock.

我们是没法进那个电力室了..Translation: We can't get into that power room.

用枪打碎那个玻璃吧,给里面控制台来上一梭子..Translation: Shoot that glass, give the console inside a burst.

坏了,这电梯不运作啊!.Translation: Damn it, this elevator isn't working!

那些僵尸正在扒开电梯门!.Translation: Those zombies are prying open the elevator door!

我把电梯底板踹烂了,快跳下去!.Translation: I kicked the elevator floor apart, jump down quickly!

按下那个按钮关上门!应该能拖住他们一会..Translation: Press that button to close the door! It should hold them off for a while.

这破铁疙瘩撑不了多久的..Translation: This broken metal piece won't hold for long.

我们从厕所绕过去..Translation: Let's go around through the restroom.

看来只能从下水口穿过去了..Translation: Looks like we can only get through the drain.

应该差不多了,做好准备!.Translation: It should be almost ready, get ready!

快进来,门在关闭!.Translation: Hurry in, the door is closing!

尝试重启这门的动力...Translation: Trying to restart the power for this door...

这会花不少时间..给我坚持住!.Translation: This will take some time... hold on for me!

快进来!我要关上这个门了!.Translation: Hurry in! I'm going to close this door!

无线电: 代号Filth,我定位到你们的位置了..Translation: Radio: Codename Filth, I have located your position.

无线电: 你们所在区域有中转站,刚好有一辆未启动的列车..Translation: Radio: There is a transfer station in your area, and there is an unstarted train.

无线电: 去搭乘列车继续你们的任务,位置发到面板上了..Translation: Radio: Go board the train to continue your mission, the location has been sent to the panel.

无线电: 但是,切记,你不能让那些病毒一起出去..Translation: Radio: But remember, you must not let those viruses escape.

无线电: 虽然很艰巨,但是你必须就地摧毁他们,结束通话..Translation: Radio: Although it is difficult, you must destroy them on site, ending the call.

他们准备攻破这里了,准备撤离!.Translation: They are preparing to breach here, get ready to evacuate!

应该会有备用电源,给我拖住他们!.Translation: There should be a backup power source, hold them off for me!

看来得搭个快车了,赶紧启动这玩意..Translation: Looks like we need to catch a fast train, hurry up and start this thing.

你先别急,这要花点时间....Translation: Don't rush, this will take some time...

无线电: 代号Filth,你们已经接近中转站了..Translation: Radio: Codename Filth, you are approaching the transfer station.

无线电: 就在后院工厂外面..Translation: Radio: It's just outside the factory in the backyard.

无线电: 记住,绝对不能让病毒一起逃跑..Translation: Radio: Remember, you must not let the viruses escape.

无线电: 不惜一切代价,结束通话..Translation: Radio: At all costs, end the call.

长官..我们人员损失惨重....Translation: Commander... we have suffered heavy losses...

结局: 尘归尘,土归土..Translation: Ending: Dust to dust, earth to earth.

...但是,我们会竭尽全力完成使命..Translation: ...But we will do our utmost to complete the mission.

该死啊,我们失去太多战友了....Translation: Damn it, we have lost too many comrades...

恐怕..是没法拖到炸弹爆炸了..Translation: I'm afraid... we won't make it to the bomb's detonation.

只有一个办法去完成任务了..Translation: There's only one way to complete the mission.

大概要60秒恢复电力..Translation: It will take about 60 seconds to restore power.

无线电: 你们需要去重启工厂电源..Translation: Radio: You need to restart the factory power.

无线电: 电源接通了我才能远程预热炸弹..Translation: Radio: I can only remotely preheat the bomb once power is restored.

无线电: 把大门防守住,直到你们上火车能刚好引爆..Translation: Radio: Defend the gate until you can board the train to detonate it.

已经无路可退了....Translation: There is no way back now...

..这是我们最后一战..Translation: This will be our last battle.

别让这些锌渣逃出去...一起他妈下地狱吧!.Translation: Don't let these bastards escape... let's send them to hell!

能跟你们战斗是我毕生的荣幸..Translation: It is my lifelong honor to fight alongside you.

愿我们...在另一个世界相见吧..Translation: May we... meet again in another world.

这门卡住了,去找个东西给他撬开..Translation: This door is stuck, find something to pry it open.

嗯...但愿这玩意起点作用..Translation: Hmm... I hope this thing works.

给我点时间干开它..Translation: Give me some time to force it open.

牛魔的酬宾,没电了!.Translation: Damn madafaka, it's out of power!

靠边站,我要动点蛮力了..Translation: Step aside, I'm going to use some brute force.
